message:
Hi there, 
are you a coworker, maker/hacker or community space user in Cairo? Then please participate in this survey on coworking, maker/hacker and community spaces!  https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/G2SRBJM
name: SurveyMonkey Powered Online Survey
caption: www.surveymonkey.com
description: Web survey powered by SurveyMonkey.com. Create your own online survey now with SurveyMonkey's expert certified FREE templates.

data.message:
My name is Angelina and I do research both as a student of a master’s program in Sustainable Development at Utrecht University in the Netherlands and as a consultant to Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) in Egypt. 
This survey should take about 15 minutes of your time and your answers will be completely anonymous. All survey results will be used to write a research report for Utrecht University. The results will be forwarded to GIZ, as well as to the respective coworking, hacker/maker and community space managers, so that they can learn from your feedback and improve the services they offer to you.
Thank you in advance :)!
Angelina

Hi Angelina I deleted your arabic post since it's a duplicate of your english post. We would like to invite you to read the group policy :)

Have a nice day,
Mohamed
Hi Mohamed, that's alright. I just posted it both in English and Arabic, in case somebody doesn't speak English. I didn't want to spam :P

No worries :D our community is all Hight Tech IT People working all over the world :)

Salud from Mexico :)
